name: LRSTAR Parser Generator
short_description: LR(1) / LR(k) parser generator. Generates very fast parsers in C++ which can build a symbol table and abstract-syntax tree. Features EBNF grammar notation (+,*,?). Includes DFASTAR lexer generator. Includes MS Visual C++ projects. Includes complete source code for LRSTAR which should compile with GCC on UNIX, Linux and Mac OS X. More powerful than yacc and bison. Faster than flex.
summary: LRSTAR parser generator + DFASTAR lexer generator
